applicationName.description: The name of an existing  Kinesis Analytics v2 Application. Note that the application must be running for a snapshot to be created.

applicationVersionId.description: The current application version ID when the snapshot was created.

snapshotCreationTimestamp.description: The timestamp of the application snapshot.

snapshotName.description: The name of the application snapshot.
